title: Riot Girl Tristana
body: I know before Trist's rework, I had riot girl and used it a bit but, after that it locked back up and I can't access it?I really liked the skin and I'm slightly upset that I can't get it again.

replies.body: That particular skin is a free promotion that you can grab through Facebook.  I don't see the skin on your account, but we'd like to help!  Just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll see if we can work something out.  We'll get back to you!
